name: concrete + glass vase Gradient Light Purple
description:
Zin + Bert like to create statements whenever they both walk into a room & love to make BIG impressions on whoever they meet.

This very large amazingly bright vase will make a statement in any room. It will also give you the street cred you crave while also being useful & beautiful at the same time.

The concrete vases have had glass submerged within concrete. Water proof.

Amazingly Smooth to touch. 
Solid Concrete. 
Each piece is unique created from moulds which I have created myself. 
Process takes 4 weeks to create. 
Each piece is sanded back to create the smooth texture and painted+ sealed for use.

Purchasing: 
Height: 18cm 
Colour: Purple / Grey Gradient

All Zin + Bert home wares will be beautifully wrapped and packaged in our custom designed, screen printed packaging which is made from recycled and sustainable materials.

name: Open Seas WOODEN screen printed COASTERS
description:

'Open Seas' coasters are also from the first collection of home wares created by Zin + Bert. 
These coasters can be used through practical day use and to also finish off home styling. 
Coaster come with big impact to brighten any decor.

Description:
Wooden coasters cut from recycled wood 100% handmade.
Each wooden coaster has been hand painted. 
Each piece is unique. 
Wooden coasters are solid wood look with smooth shiny finish.
Sealed for use.
